Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.ViewControllers

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.ViewControllers.ViewController
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.ViewControllers.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
HelperWindow
Direct Known Subclasses:
InteractiveBoardController
public class BoardController
extends ViewController
implements HelperWindow
Represents the controller associated to the board's scene
